creator: jeff_melnick@securecomputing.com
text:
ap_proxy_location_reverse_map() is doing a case sensitive comparision.
However, according to RFC2396 section 6:
...the host names used in URL are actually case insensitive...
So, ap_proxy_location_reverse_map() should be doing a case insensitive 
comparison.  At least on the hostname part.

Created attachment 7101
Replace strncmp with strncasecmp
creator: apache@moresecurity.org

text:
The patch i sent should fix the problem, i just replaced the compare function
with a case insensitive one.

Matthieu
creator: apache@moresecurity.org
trawick@apache.org
text:
enabling the PatchAvailable keyword
updated doc on submitting patches is at http://httpd.apache.org/dev/patches.html
